name: Bullet Speed -- Game Laucher
description:
Install instructions

Bullet Speed is a Fast Paced FPS inspired by the old school shooters era.

(this launcher is ofc very professional)

How to play:

  • Use a VPN Lan-Like (like hamachi or a OpenVPN Server) to play with firends without port fowarding.
  • Host a game and give your VPN IP for your friends to join.

   OR

  • Open PORT 7777 
  • Host / Join (public IP)
